features.name: Ticket List Display
features.description: Display a paginated list of user's support tickets with sorting and status information
test_scenarios: View list of tickets when user has tickets
Display 'No Activity' message when no tickets exist
Navigate through paginated results
Verify correct display of ticket ID, subject, status, and date
Click on ticket row to open ticket details

features.name: Create New Ticket
features.description: Create new support tickets with custom fields and file attachments
test_scenarios: Create ticket with required fields only
Create ticket with all custom fields populated
Attach single file to ticket
Attach multiple files to ticket
Validate required field enforcement
Validate field format for regexp fields
Cancel ticket creation and return to list
Display success message after ticket creation

features.name: Search and Filter Tickets
features.description: Search tickets by keyword and filter by status
test_scenarios: Search tickets by keyword in subject
Search tickets by keyword in description
Filter tickets by status (New, Open, Pending, Hold, Solved, Closed, All)
Combine keyword search with status filter
Clear search and show all tickets
Verify search is case-insensitive

features.name: View Ticket Details
features.description: Display detailed information about a specific ticket including comments and attachments
features.ui_location: Module view > Click on ticket row
test_scenarios: View ticket subject and description
Display creation and last activity dates
Show all public comments on ticket
Display comment author and timestamp
View attached files in comments
Click 'Back to Tickets' to return to list
Click 'Refresh Ticket' to reload details
Verify user can only view their own tickets

features.name: Add Comments to Tickets
features.description: Add new comments to existing tickets with optional file attachments
test_scenarios: Add text-only comment to ticket
Add comment with single file attachment
Add comment with multiple file attachments
Cancel comment without saving
Verify comment appears after submission
Verify ticket status changes to 'open' after comment
Validate empty comment rejection
Handle file upload errors (0-byte files)

features.name: File Attachment Management
features.description: Upload and display file attachments for tickets and comments
features.ui_location: Create Ticket form > File field, Comment form > Attach File
test_scenarios: Upload single file with ticket creation
Upload multiple files with ticket creation
Upload files with comment
Display image attachments as thumbnails
Display non-image attachments as download links
Handle large file uploads
Validate file upload errors
Open attachment in new tab

features.name: Custom Field Configuration
features.description: Dynamic form fields based on Zendesk ticket field configuration
test_scenarios: Display text input fields
Display textarea fields
Display dropdown/select fields (tagger)
Display regexp validated fields
Display file upload fields
Enforce required field validation
Show field descriptions as tooltips
Order fields by position

features.name: User Synchronization
features.description: Automatically create or update Zendesk users based on DNN user information
test_scenarios: Create new Zendesk user on first ticket creation
Update existing Zendesk user with external ID
Find user by email if external ID not set
Handle special characters in display names
Verify user ID association with tickets
Handle user creation failures gracefully

features.name: Pagination
features.description: Navigate through pages of tickets when list exceeds page size
test_scenarios: Display page count information
Navigate to next page
Navigate to previous page
Disable prev button on first page
Disable next button on last page
Hide pagination when only one page exists
Respect configured page size setting

features.name: Configuration Validation
features.description: Validate Zendesk connector configuration before allowing module usage
test_scenarios: Block API calls when Zendesk not configured
Display 'Not Configured' error message
Verify configuration on module load
Check for required settings (URL, Email, Password)
Validate field IDs configuration

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Handle and display errors from Zendesk API and network issues
test_scenarios: Handle Zendesk API connection errors
Display user-friendly error messages
Log exceptions to DNN event log
Handle ticket not found errors
Handle authentication failures
Handle network timeouts
Validate form data before API calls

features.name: Browser History Navigation
features.description: Support browser back/forward buttons for navigation between views
test_scenarios: Navigate back from ticket details to list
Navigate back from create ticket to list
Navigate forward to previously viewed ticket
Maintain state during browser navigation
Update URL parameters for deep linking

features.name: Social Scoring Integration
features.description: Track user activities for gamification and scoring purposes
test_scenarios: Log points for creating a ticket
Log points for viewing a ticket
Log points for commenting on a ticket
Verify scoring action definitions exist
Handle scoring failures gracefully
